name: Desert Fog
description:
You play as a Mech Titan trying to survive against waves of Aliens. You must Kill the Real Aliens to stop them from summoning decoys.

The Game is a top-down shooter where you move the character around to dodge the enemies while aiming with the mouse in the direction you want to shoot.

You must survive the shoot-out by killing all the real summoner aliens to make it through each wave.

CONTROLS:

- Movement Keys: W, A, S, D or Up, Left , Down, Right arrow keys

- Aim with Mouse Cursor

- Left Mouse Click to fire Weapon

- "ESC" or "P" to Pause the game

This is my Second GameJam, This game was created for Brackeys GameJam that had 7 Days to complete. The theme for the Jam was "It is Not Real".

The Music in this game was downloaded from FreeSFX:
www.freesfx.co.uk/

I hope you enjoy it
